altername_name: Athanor 2: The Legend Of The Birdmen
name: Athanor 2: La Légende Des Hommes
overview: Athanor 2 not only features a typical 80's style North, South, East command interface of adventure games of old, but unlike the first game which we also enjoyed, it features full mouse control, enriched dialogues, different phases of gameplay, throughout multiple locations through 4 worlds, full 256 colours, extra sounds and much much more all for your Amiga 1200 and above. So yes certainly a game that if you get the chance to buy it, you'll be pleased to have it in your collection!
